thread.title_full: Green transport systems are urgently needed as pollution causes 10 times more deaths than car ... - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Green transport systems are urgently needed as pollution causes 10 times more deaths than car ...
text: ( Source : EFD - Europe of Freedom & Democracy Group ) All Europeans should be aware that urban mobility still relies overwhelmingly on the use of conventionally powered cars. As a consequence, transport in the EU is dependent on oil
